creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: constructed like an apron, the larger unlined part has center embroidery section of hexagons with geometric centers; border of plain and embroidered strips on 3 sides; 2 corners have layerd squares with embroidered center; small lined section has smaller geometric centered hexagons; tan, black and red; uncut threads on back of large part; cut ties
title: Baby Carrier
